Description: The elegant tone quality and design of this guitar will bring real satisfaction of ownership to the most critical player. A truly outstanding acoustic/electric, the A-150 Savoy is a pleasure to see and hear, pairing a wonderfully free-playing late-1950s Guild orchestra model with the distinctive addition of an exceptionally voiced DeArmond Rhythm Chief 1000 floating pickup. The welcome return of a true Guild classic. Title: Guild A-150 Savoy Hollowbody Sunburst Archtop Electric Guitar w/ Hard Shell Case
